sourcesContent:
import { FunctionComponent, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Card from "../interfaces/Card"; import { getCardById } from "../services/cardsServices"; interface CardInfoProps {} const CardInfo: FunctionComponent = () => { let { id } = useParams(); let navigate = useNavigate(); let [card, setCard] = useState({ title: "", subTitle: "", description: "", phone: "", email: "", web: "", imageUrl: "", imageAlt: "", state: "", country: "", city: "", street: "", houseNumber: 0, zip: "", }); useEffect(() => { getCardById(Number(id)) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data); setCard(res.data); }) .catch((error) => console.log(error)); }, []); return ( <> {/*
{card.title}
{card.subTitle}

{card.description}

Phone: {card.phone}

Email: {card.email}

WebSite: {card.web}

country: {card.country}

city: {card.city}

street: {card.street}

zip: {card.zip}

*/} {/*
{card.title}
{card.subTitle}

{card.description}

Phone: {card.phone}

Email: {card.email}

WebSite: {card.web}

country: {card.country}

city: {card.city}

street: {card.street}

zip: {card.zip}

See Profile
*/}
Card title

This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer.

Last updated 3 mins ago

); }; export default CardInfo;
